body_html:
Instead of MSBuild /p:Configuration=Release ALL_BUILD.vcxproj, you should follow the instructions here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/README.md
You should run:

MSBuild /p:Configuration=Release tf_python_build_pip_package.vcxproj
body_text:
Instead of MSBuild /p:Configuration=Release ALL_BUILD.vcxproj, you should follow the instructions here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/README.md
You should run:
MSBuild /p:Configuration=Release tf_python_build_pip_package.vcxproj
body:
Instead of `MSBuild /p:Configuration=Release ALL_BUILD.vcxproj`, you should follow the instructions here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/README.md
You should run:
```
MSBuild /p:Configuration=Release tf_python_build_pip_package.vcxproj
```
